headline: Oppenheimer Cites Strong Automotive and AI Demand Driving Monolithic Power Systems, Inc. (MPWR) Upside
summary: We recently compiled a list of 10 High Growth Technology Stocks That Are Profitable. Monolithic Power Systems, Inc. stands third on our list of high growth stocks. TheFly reported on January 29 that Oppenheimer increased its price target for MPWR to $1,300 from $1,200 while maintaining an Outperform rating. The firm noted robust demand from the automotive and artificial intelligence […]
